Dialogue.Page: Well well well! Back so soon? Let me guess… yeah, you want to get some practice in with this little beauty of a machine over here, don't you?
If you ask me, I think you had a fine takeoff! But if you really want to practice with me, I guess I could help you out a little.
…Hmm? Oh! Heya. Sorry, I was just kinda… distracted, thinkin' about stuff.
Me and Slate made some cool modifications to my model ship over here. You can, umm… take it for a spin, yeah! It'll be good practice for the real thing.
…Hmm? Oh! Heya. Sorry, I was just kinda… distracted. You… you see the sun getting all big and red too, right? It's not just me?

DialogueOption.Text: I think that just happens sometimes.

Dialogue.Page: Well? Come on, what are you waiting for?
Wow, that was just like the time the external fuel tanks exploded on reentry!
You’ll… you’ll be okay flying the big one, right?
…Eugh… I… it can't be too soon, can it? How did it get like that so fast? I can't… come on, Mica, breathe…
…A-and why did it get so dark all of a sudden? Like… darker than night usually is?
…Shit! Shit shit shit, we're all gonna die! You monster, why would you tell me?! I could've died in ignorance! Oh Hearth, oh Hearth!
If you're going to tell a dumb joke like that, the least you could do is smile!
Oh Hearth, you're not kidding, are you? I… I need to lie down.
I wouldn't know it myself. I'm an engineer, not a astonomer!
Anyways, if you wanna get some test flying in, I'm the Hearthian to go to! Give this mechanical marvel a test run, will ya?
